short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create appointment in google calendar, copies the title of the page in subject and url in body automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add to calendar extension allows you create google calendar appointment. It automatically defaults the title of the appointment to the title of the page where you want to create appointment and add the URL of the page to the body of the event.  This will help in saving the manual copy/paste as well as person can check details later when reminder come.
